bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25843.title: 8,8cm KwK 36 Breech
bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25843.description:
Breech of German heavy tank Tiger I

Uses shells:
AP: PzGr 39
HE: Sprgr
HEAT: Hl.Gr 39

ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25840.title: Soviet AP Shell
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25840.description:
Regular Armor-Piercing shell
Effective against armored targets.

Explodes behind the armor

ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25841.title: Soviet HE Shell
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25841.description:
Regular High-Explosive shell
Effective against manpower and lightly armored targets.

Explodes with a lot of shrapnel at any hit

ec18cdbf-865e-122c-9c5e-f111bad25840.title: PzGr 39
ec18cdbf-865e-122c-9c5e-f111bad25840.description:
Armor-Piercing High-Explosive shell
Effective against armored targets.

Explodes behind the armor

ec18cdbf-865e-122c-9c5e-f111bad25841.title: Sprgr
ec18cdbf-865e-122c-9c5e-f111bad25841.description:
High-Explosive shell
Effective against manpower and lightly armored targets.

Explodes with a lot of shrapnel at any hit

ec18cdbf-865e-122c-5c2e-f111bad25842.title: HlGr 39
ec18cdbf-865e-122c-5c2e-f111bad25842.description:
High-Explosive Anti-Tank shell
Effective against armored targets.

Does not lose penetration capacity with distance, but lose 10 of it for each air block behind the target

ec18cdbf-865e-122c-9c5e-f111bad25842.title: 37mm AP Shell
ec18cdbf-865e-122c-9c5e-f111bad25842.description:
Armor-Piercing shell
Effective against armored targets

ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f122bed25803.title: Soviet 122mm AP Bullet
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f122bed25803.description:
Regular Armor-Piercing shell
Effective against armored targets.

Explodes behind the armor

ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f122bed25804.title: Soviet 122mm HE Bullet
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f122bed25804.description:
Regular High-Explosive shell
Effective against manpower and lightly armored targets

ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f122bed25802.title: 152mm HE Bullet
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f122bed25802.description:
High-Explosive bullet
Effective.

Explodes with a lot of shrapnel at any hit

55a069ad-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b53.title: Player Fixer
55a069ad-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b53.description: Use it to mount your character

66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b55.title: Turret Steer
66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b55.description:
Press A or D to rotate your turret instead of using buttons or controllers

Press 1 to slow down and 2 to speed up the rotation speed

66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b22.title: Periscope
66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b22.description:
Connect it to a viewport to see behind walls
You can connect bearings to it and press WASD to turn the viewport

66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3d07.title: Machine Gun Handle
66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3d07.description: Connect it to bearings to control them with WASD

66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3d09.title: Case Holder
66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3d09.description: Holds a dropped case. Gives a signal when it has a case
